activities.originalActivity: After any setback, ask 'What can I learn from this?' and 'How can I use this to get stronger?'

dailyDoItems.action: I write down exactly what happened in this setback using only factual details, no interpretations
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have written a factual account of the events without emotional language

dailyDoItems.action: I engage in an AI-guided discussion to identify 3 specific lessons from this experience
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have identified 3 concrete lessons I can apply going forward

aiDiscussion.inviteMessage: Would it be helpful if I guide you through discovering what this setback can teach you?

dailyDoItems.action: I choose one specific way to apply these lessons immediately and take that action today
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have taken one concrete action based on what I learned

activities.originalActivity: Always ask 'How can I make this work better AND look more beautiful?'

dailyDoItems.action: I pick one thing I'm currently working on and examine both its function and appearance
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have identified one specific aspect of function and one of appearance to improve

dailyDoItems.action: I engage in an AI-guided brainstorming session to find ways to improve both function and beauty
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have generated 3 ideas that improve both how it works and how it looks

aiDiscussion.inviteMessage: Ready to brainstorm ways to make this both more functional and more beautiful?

dailyDoItems.action: I implement the most promising improvement that enhances both function and beauty
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have made one change that improves both how it works and how it looks

activities.originalActivity: Ask 'Can I actually control this?' and only spend energy on things where the answer is yes

dailyDoItems.action: I write down one current worry or frustration that's consuming my mental energy
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have written down one specific worry or frustration

dailyDoItems.action: I create two columns labeled 'I Can Control' and 'I Cannot Control' and sort aspects of this situation
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have sorted at least 5 aspects into the appropriate control columns

dailyDoItems.action: I take one specific action on something from my 'I Can Control' list and mentally release the rest
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have completed one action on something I can control and consciously let go of what I can't

activities.originalActivity: Ask 'How can I show love to this person?' even when they're difficult or unkind

dailyDoItems.action: I pause and take three deep breaths when I notice frustration or anger toward someone
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have completed 3 full breaths before responding to the difficult person

dailyDoItems.action: I engage in an AI-guided reflection to find one way to show genuine care for this person
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have identified one specific, genuine way to show love despite their behavior

aiDiscussion.inviteMessage: Would you like help exploring ways to show love to someone who's being difficult?

dailyDoItems.action: I express this loving action toward them, focusing on their wellbeing rather than my feelings
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have taken one loving action toward this person despite their difficult behavior

activities.originalActivity: Ask 'How can I use my abilities to help others grow?' in every role you have

dailyDoItems.action: I identify one specific ability or skill I have that could benefit someone else's development
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have identified one specific skill and one person who could benefit from it

dailyDoItems.action: I engage in an AI-guided planning session to design how I can share this ability helpfully
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have a specific plan for sharing my ability in a way that promotes their growth

aiDiscussion.inviteMessage: Want to explore the best ways to share your abilities to help someone grow?

dailyDoItems.action: I offer my help to this person in a way that empowers them rather than creating dependence
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have shared my ability in a way that builds their capability rather than their reliance

activities.originalActivity: Ask 'How can this be 10x better?' before calling anything finished

dailyDoItems.action: I look at something I'm about to call 'finished' and pause before declaring it done
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have stopped and really looked at my work instead of rushing to finish

dailyDoItems.action: I engage in an AI-guided visioning session to imagine what 10x better would actually look like
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have a clear picture of what 10x improvement would mean for this work

aiDiscussion.inviteMessage: Ready to explore what 10x better could look like for this project?

dailyDoItems.action: I make one specific change that moves my work significantly closer to that 10x vision
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have implemented one substantial improvement inspired by the 10x vision

activities.originalActivity: Ask 'How can we move forward together?' instead of 'How can I prove I'm right?'

dailyDoItems.action: I notice when I feel the urge to prove my point and pause before speaking
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have caught myself wanting to prove I'm right and paused instead

dailyDoItems.action: I ask the other person 'What matters most to you about solving this?' and really listen
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have asked about their priorities and listened to understand their perspective

dailyDoItems.action: I propose one specific way we can move forward that incorporates both of our concerns
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have suggested a path forward that addresses both perspectives

activities.originalActivity: Ask 'How does this make someone feel?' and redesign until the feeling is magical

dailyDoItems.action: I look at something I've created and imagine experiencing it for the first time
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have put myself in the shoes of someone encountering my work fresh

dailyDoItems.action: I engage in an AI-guided exploration of what emotions my work currently evokes vs. what I want it to evoke
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have identified the current feeling and defined the magical feeling I want to create

aiDiscussion.inviteMessage: Want to explore the emotional impact of your work and how to make it magical?

dailyDoItems.action: I make one specific change designed to evoke that magical feeling in the person experiencing it
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have modified my work specifically to create a more magical emotional experience

activities.originalActivity: Ask 'How does this work?' and 'What if I tried this differently?' about everyday things

dailyDoItems.action: I pick one ordinary object I can see right now and examine it with genuine curiosity
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have spent focused time really looking at and wondering about an everyday object

dailyDoItems.action: I engage in an AI-guided exploration of how this object works and alternative ways it could function
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I understand better how it works and have imagined 3 different approaches

aiDiscussion.inviteMessage: Ready to dive deep into how this works and explore creative alternatives?

dailyDoItems.action: I apply this curiosity to one routine I do today, questioning how it works and trying a different approach
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have consciously tried a different approach to a routine activity

activities.originalActivity: Ask 'How will this affect other people?' and 'What serves the greater good?'

dailyDoItems.action: I identify one decision I need to make today and write down who else might be affected by it
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have listed at least 3 people or groups who might be impacted by my decision

dailyDoItems.action: I engage in an AI-guided discussion to explore how different choices would serve the greater good
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have examined multiple options through the lens of broader benefit

aiDiscussion.inviteMessage: Want to explore how your decision options might serve the greater good?

dailyDoItems.action: I make my decision based on what serves the most people's wellbeing, even if it's less convenient for me
dailyDoItems.successCriteria: I have chosen the option that serves the greater good over personal convenience
